content.raw:
I was able to test this using these steps. Thanks! 

The result I got from iperf was:

```
Client connecting to 192.168.2.150, TCP port 5001
TCP window size: 45.0 KByte (default)
------------------------------------------------------------
[  3] local 192.168.2.10 port 50098 connected with 192.168.2.150 port 5001
[ ID] Interval       Transfer     Bandwidth
[  3]  0.0-598.4 sec   256 KBytes  3.50 Kbits/sec

```
